variations.description: Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to 90% of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to 105% of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to 120% of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to 135% of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to 150% of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds. Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to 60% of Mineer's ATK.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds. Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to 70% of Mineer's ATK.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds. Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to 80% of Mineer's ATK.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds. Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to 90% of Mineer's ATK.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds. Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to 100% of Mineer's ATK.
When dealing damage, there is 8% chance to generate 1 Order Energy and increase damage dealt by 20% for 5s.
When dealing damage, there is a 15% chance to generate 1 Order Energy and increase damage dealt by 20% for 5s.
